CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 17, 1957, pg. SM6 reads: "Charmers - A quartette [sic] of charmers, representing three cities at the ABA bridge tournament in Pittsburgh, shows Mrs. Jane Boyd, Los Angeles; Mrs. Clarice Green, Chicago; Mrs. Ann Moore, Washington, D.C., and Mrs. Olga Markham, Chicago. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Jane Boyd, Clarice Green, Ann Moore, and Olga Markham, posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
